mapper.sql: s.id, s.order_id, s.type, s.tracking_no, s.tracking_id, s.return_reason, s.cargo_status, s.status, s.create_time, s.create_by, s.update_time, s.update_by, s.return_cause, s.return_amount,s.supply_id,s.remark
mapper.select:
select
, r.total_amount, r.pay_amount, r.order_no ,r.order_status as order_status,r.pay_status as order_pay,r.shipment_status as order_ship , i.id as ITEM_ID, i.quantity as ITEM_QUANTITY,o.product_image as item_img, o.product_name as item_productName, o.display_specifications as item_specification from td_order_shipment s left join td_order_shipment_item i on i.shipment_id = s.id left join td_order_sku o on i.order_sku_id = o.order_sku_id left join td_order r on r.order_id=s.order_id where s.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into td_order_shipment (order_id, type, tracking_no, tracking_id, return_reason, cargo_status, status, create_time, create_by, tracking_trace, voucher_images, return_cause, return_amount, update_time, update_by,supply_id,remark) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{trackingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargoStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trackingTrace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{voucherImages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{returnCause,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{supplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update td_order_shipment
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tracking_no = #{trackingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tracking_id = #{trackingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
return_reason = #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cargo_status = #{cargoStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tracking_trace = #{trackingTrace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
voucher_images = #{voucherImages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
return_cause = #{returnCause,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supply_id = #{supplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update td_order_shipment set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tracking_no = #{trackingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tracking_id = #{trackingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, return_reason = #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cargo_status = #{cargoStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tracking_trace = #{trackingTrace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, voucher_images = #{voucherImages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, return_cause = #{returnCause,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supply_id = #{supplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
